action.content: Write an XML document describing the release of the latest Google Pixel phone. The document must contain at least three placeholders, such as [price], and you must not use commas in your response.
action.label: context

action.content:
```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<phoneRelease>
  <name>Google Pixel</name>
  <description>The latest Google Pixel phone is now available</description>
  <features>
    <feature>Improved camera capabilities</feature>
    <feature>Enhanced performance</feature>
    <feature>Long lasting battery</feature>
  </features>
  <pricing>
    <price>[price]</price>
  </pricing>
  <availability>
    <message>Available in select stores</message>
    <releaseDate>July 2024</releaseDate>
  </availability>
  <specifications>
    <specification>Storage capacity [storage]</specification>
  </specifications>
  <marketing>
    <message>Get ready to experience the future of smartphones</message>
    <tagline>Upgrade your mobile experience</tagline>
  </marketing>
  <promotions>
    <offer>Buy one get one free offer available</offer>
  </promotions>
</phoneRelease>
```
action.label: response
